mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPL ( USER_ID, ADMS_NO, DEPT_CODE, ARI_INST_CODE, CORS_TYPE_CODE, DETL_MAJ_CODE, INP_DETL_MAJ, PART_TIME_YN, KOR_NAME, CHN_NAME, ENG_SUR, ENG_NAME, RGST_NO, ZIP_CODE, ADDR, DETL_ADDR, TEL_NUM, MOBI_NUM, FAX_NUM, MAIL_ADDR, APPL_ID, APPL_STS_CODE, PRIV_INFO_YN, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{applNo}, #{userId}, #{admsNo}, #{deptCode}, #{ariInsstCode}, #{corsTypeCode}, #{detlMajCode}, #{inpDetlMaj}, #{partTimeYn}, #{korName}, #{chnName}, #{engSur}, #{engName}, #{rgstNo}, #{zipCode}, #{addr}, #{detlAddr}, #{telNum}, #{mobiNum}, #{faxNum}, #{mailAddr}, #{applId}, #{applStsCode}, #{privInfoYn}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )

insert into APPL_ACAD ( APPL_NO, ACAD_SEQ, ACAD_TYPE_CODE, LAST_SCHL_YN, ENTR_DAY, GRDA_DAY, SCHL_CODE, SCHL_NAME, COLL_NAME, MAJ_NAME, GRAD_AVR, GRAD_FULL, GRDA_TYPE_CODE, QUAL_EXAM_DAY, QUAL_AREA_CODE, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values ( #{applNo}, #{acadSeq}, #{acadTypeCode}, #{lastSchlYn}, #{entrDay}, #{grdaDay}, #{schlCode}, #{schlName}, #{collName}, #{majName}, #{gradAvr}, #{gradFull}, #{grdaTypeCode}, #{qualExamDay}, #{qualAreaCode}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )

insert into APPL_LANG ( APPL_NO, LANG_SEQ, LANG_EXAM_CODE, TOFL_TYPE_CODE, LANG_GRAD, EXAM_NO, EXAM_DAY, EXPR_DAY, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values ( #{applNo}, #{langSeq}, #{langExamCode}, #{toflTypeCode}, #{langGrad}, #{examNo}, #{examDay}, #{exprDay}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )
insert into APPL_ETC ( APPL_NO, COV_LETT, STUD_PLAN, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values ( #{applNo}, #{covLett}, #{studPlan}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )

insert into APPL_EXPR ( APPL_NO, EXPR_SEQ, JOIN_DAY, RETR_DAY, CORP_NAME, EXPR_DESC, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values ( #{applNo}, #{exprSeq}, #{joinDay}, #{retrDay}, #{corpName}, #{exprDesc}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )

insert into APPL_GENE ( APPL_NO, CURR_WRKP_NAME, CURR_WRKP_DAY, CURR_WRKP_TEL, EMER_CONT_CODE, EMER_CONT_NAME, EMER_CONT_TEL, HNDC_GRAD, HNDC_TYPE, MLTR_SERV_CODE, MLTR_JOIN_DAY, MLTR_DSCH_DAY, MLTR_TYPE_CODE, MLTR_RANK_CODE, BACH_GRAD_AVR, BACH_GRAD_FULL, MAST_GRAD_AVR, MAST_GRAD_FULL, FORL_EXMP_CODE, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values ( #{applNo}, #{currWrkpName}, #{currWrkpDay}, #{currWrkpTel}, #{emerContCode}, #{emerContName}, #{emerContTel}, #{hndcGrad}, #{hndcType}, #{mltrServCode}, #{mltrJoinDay}, #{mltrDschDay}, #{mltrTypeCode}, #{mltrRankCode}, #{bachGradAvr}, #{bachGradFull}, #{mastGradAvr}, #{mastGradFull}, #{forlExmpCode}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )
insert into CAMP ( CAMP_CODE, CAMP_NAME, USE_YN, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values ( #{campCode}, #{campName}, #{useYn}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )

insert into DEPT ( DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, COLL_CODE, AFFL_NAME, USE_YN, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values ( #{deptCode}, #{deptName}, #{collCode}, #{afflName}, #{useYn}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )

insert into ADMS ( ADMS_NO, ENTR_YEAR, ADMS_TYPE_CODE, ADMS_DESC, ADMS_STS_CODE, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values ( #{admsNo}, #{entrYear}, #{admsTypeCode}, #{admsDesc}, #{admsStsCode}, #{creId}, #{creDate}, #{modId}, #{modDate} )
